info.title: F5 Application Services Demostration API
info.description: Building Cloud Ready F5 Controller Services

post.description: Create a new user for the demonstration application

get.summary: API endpoint to get a list of User objects
get.description: Get a list of all defined user objects allowed in the demonstration application

get.summary: API endpoint to get a User object referencing it id
get.description: Get a list of a User object allowed in the demonstration application

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the User object to return

404.description: User not found for supplied id

put.summary: API endpoint to update a User object referencing it id
put.description: Update a User's roles or password in the demonstration application

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the User object to return

404.description: User not found for supplied id

delete.summary: API endpoint to delete a User object referencing it id
delete.description: Delete a User allowed in the demonstration application

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the User object to return

404.description: User not found for supplied id

post.summary: API endpoint to create BIG-IP Device Trusts
post.description: Create a new BIG-IP device trust for the demonstration application

get.summary: API endpoint to get a list of BIG-IP device trusts
get.description: Get a list of all BIG-IP device trust allowed in the demonstration application

get.summary: API endpoint to get a BIG-IP Device Trust
get.description: List a BIG-IP device trust from the demonstration application

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: ID of the BIG-IP device trust to list

200.description: The new BIG-IP device trust was deleted

delete.summary: API endpoint to remove BIG-IP Device Trusts
delete.description: Remove a BIG-IP device trust from the demonstration application

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: ID of the BIG-IP device trust to delete

200.description: The new BIG-IP device trust was deleted

get.summary: API endpoint to issue an iControl REST GET call
get.description: Place a GET request to a trusted BIG-IP from the demonstration application

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: ID of the BIG-IP device trust to place iControl GET Request

parameters.name: iControlRestURIEndpoint
parameters.description:
The iControl REST API endpoint to make request on trusted BIG-IP device.

i.e.: /mgmt/shared/identified-devices/config/device-info

404.description: User not found for supplied id

post.summary: API endpoint to issue an iControl REST POST call
post.description: Place a POST request to a trusted BIG-IP from the demonstration application

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: ID of the BIG-IP device trust to place iControl POST Request

parameters.name: iControlRestURIEndpoint
parameters.description: The iControl REST API endpoint to make request on trusted BIG-IP device

404.description: User not found for supplied id

put.summary: API endpoint to issue an iControl REST PUT call
put.description: Place a PUT request to a trusted BIG-IP from the demonstration application

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: ID of the BIG-IP device trust to place iControl PUT Request

parameters.name: iControlRestURIEndpoint
parameters.description: The iControl REST API endpoint to make request on trusted BIG-IP device

404.description: User not found for supplied id

patch.summary: API endpoint to issue an iControl REST PATCH call
patch.description: Place a PATCH request to a trusted BIG-IP from the demonstration application

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: ID of the BIG-IP device trust to place iControl PATCH Request

parameters.name: iControlRestURIEndpoint
parameters.description: The iControl REST API endpoint to make request on trusted BIG-IP device

404.description: User not found for supplied id

delete.summary: API endpoint to issue an iControl REST DELETE call
delete.description: Place a DELETE request to a trusted BIG-IP from the demonstration application

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: ID of the BIG-IP device trust to place iControl DELETE Request

parameters.name: iControlRestURIEndpoint
parameters.description: The iControl REST API endpoint to make request on trusted BIG-IP device

404.description: User not found for supplied id

post.summary: API endpoint to create a deployment of BIG-IP trusted devices
post.description: Create a new target deployment for the demonstration application

get.summary: API endpoint to list deployments of BIG-IP trusted devices
get.description: Lists available deployments for the demonstration application

put.summary: API endpoint to update a deployment of BIG-IP trusted devices
put.description: Update a target deployment for the demonstration application

parameters.name: deploymentId
parameters.description: ID of the deployment to update

delete.summary: API endpoint to delete a deployment of BIG-IP trusted devices
delete.description: Delete target deployment from the demonstration application

parameters.name: deploymentId
parameters.description: ID of the deployment to delete

get.summary: API endpoint to issue an iControl REST GET call to a deployment
get.description: Place a GET request to all trusted BIG-IPs, in a deployemnt, from the demonstration application

parameters.name: deploymentId
parameters.description: ID of the deployment to place iControl GET Request

parameters.name: iControlRestURIEndpoint
parameters.description:
The iControl REST API endpoint without the leading path slash to make request on deployment.

i.e.: /mgmt/shared/identified-devices/config/device-info

404.description: User not found for supplied id

post.summary: API endpoint to issue an iControl REST GET call to a deployment
post.description: Place a POST request to all trusted BIG-IPs, in a deployemnt, from the demonstration application

parameters.name: deploymentId
parameters.description: ID of the deployment to place iControl POST Request

parameters.name: iControlRestURIEndpoint
parameters.description: The iControl REST API endpoint to make request on deployment

404.description: User not found for supplied id

put.summary: API endpoint to issue an iControl REST GET call to a deployment
put.description: Place a PUT request to all trusted BIG-IPs, in a deployemnt, from the demonstration application

parameters.name: deploymentId
parameters.description: ID of the deployment to place iControl PUT Request

parameters.name: iControlRestURIEndpoint
parameters.description: The iControl REST API endpoint to make request on deployment

404.description: User not found for supplied id

patch.summary: API endpoint to issue an iControl REST GET call to a deployment
patch.description: Place a PATCH request to all trusted BIG-IPs, in a deployemnt, from the demonstration application

parameters.name: deploymentId
parameters.description: ID of the deployment to place iControl PATCH Request

parameters.name: iControlRestURIEndpoint
parameters.description: The iControl REST API endpoint to make request on deployment

404.description: User not found for supplied id

delete.summary: API endpoint to issue an iControl REST GET call to a deployment
delete.description: Place a DELETE request to all trusted BIG-IPs, in a deployemnt, from the demonstration application

parameters.name: deploymentId
parameters.description: ID of the deployment to place iControl DELETE Request

parameters.name: iControlRestURIEndpoint
parameters.description: The iControl REST API endpoint to make request on deployment

404.description: User not found for supplied id
